Over the past few years reusable water bottles have become more and more popular, both as a way to both stay hydrated and cut down on waste. 
It’s estimated that Americans throw away close to 2.5 million plastic bottles every hour , and simply put, it’s an unnecessary waste. 
Many brands, including Nalgene , Hydro Flask , and Klean Kanteen have quickly become popular in the space, but I have found that all of these water bottles have the same problem: They are infuriatingly difficult to clean. 
While many of these bottles are dishwasher safe, some aren't, and not all of us have the luxury of a dishwasher at our disposal. As a guy who washes dishes by hand, I often end up rinsing out bottles with warm water instead of really cleaning them. 
The ALEX Bottle has solved this issue by using "Clean Seam Technology," a design choice that lets you unscrew the bottle at both its midpoint and top. This let's you to scrub away any and all gunk that might need cleaning without trouble. 
Because it's constructed out of recycled and eco-friendly materials, the 26 oz. ALEX Bottle is also one of the most environmentally friendly bottles on the market. It's also available in a wide variety of colors, you can find a look that best matches your style. 
It even works as a shot glass in a pinch — and because it's so easy to clean, you don't have to feel guilty about putting liquids besides water in it. 
ALEX Bottle Instagram 
With over 50 billion plastic water bottles being used every year, it’s clear that investing in a reusable water bottle is a good move for anyone who wants to cut down on waste. The ALEX Bottle is a great option because it's convenient, holds plenty of water, and will never leave you frustrated in the kitchen when it’s time to clean up.
